de.polygonal.ds.mem.IntMemory

type
class
extends
MemoryAccess

A chunk of "alchemy memory" for storing 32-bit signed integers.

Static Methods

ofArray(input : Array<Int>, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : IntMemory

parameters
min index pointing to the first integer.
max index pointing to the last integer.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to an IntMemory object. If no range is specified, all input values are copied.

ofByteArray(input : flash.utils.ByteArray, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : IntMemory

parameters
min index pointing to the byte storing the first integer.
min index pointing to the byte storing the last integer.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to an IntMemory object. If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

ofBytesData(input : haxe.io.BytesData, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : IntMemory

parameters
min index pointing to the byte storing the first integer.
min index pointing to the byte storing the last integer.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to an IntMemory object. If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

ofVector(input : flash.Vector<Int>, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : IntMemory

parameters
min index pointing to the first integer.
max index pointing to the last integer.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to an IntMemory object. If no range is specified, all input values are copied.

toArray(input : IntMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : Array<Int>

parameters
min index pointing to the first integer.
max index pointing to the last integer.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to an array. If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

toByteArray(input : IntMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : flash.utils.ByteArray

parameters
min index pointing to the first integer.
max index pointing to the last integer.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a byte array. If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.
The bytes are written in little endian format.

toBytesData(input : IntMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : haxe.io.BytesData

parameters
min index pointing to the first integer.
max index pointing to the last integer.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a BytesData object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.
The bytes are written in little endian format.

toUnsignedVector(input : IntMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : flash.Vector<UInt>

parameters
min index pointing to the first integer.
max index pointing to the last integer.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a vector object. If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

toVector(input : IntMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int, ?output : flash.Vector<Int>) : flash.Vector<Int>

parameters
min index pointing to the first integer.
max index pointing to the last integer.
output the Vector object to write into. If null, a new Vector object is created on-the-fly.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a vector object If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

Constructor

new(size : Int, ?name : String)

Creates a byte array capable of storing a total of size integers.

key : Int

de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess
A unique identifier for this object.
A hash table transforms this key into an index of an array element by using a hash function.
This value should never be changed by the user.

inline get(i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Returns the integer at index i.

inline getAddr(i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Returns the memory byte offset of the first byte storing the integer at index i.

resize(newSize : Int) : Void

overrides
de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid size (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory was already deallocated (debug only).
Adjusts the size of this object so it's capable of storing newSize integers.

inline set(i : Int, x : Int) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Replaces the integer at the index i with the integer x.

inline swp(i : Int, j : Int) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError i equals j (debug only).
Swaps the integer at index i with the integer at index j.

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object.
Prints out all elements if compiled with the -debug directive.
Example:
	  var mem = new new de.polygonal.ds.mem.IntMemory(4);
	  for (i in 0...4) {
	      mem.set(i, i);
	  }
	  trace(mem);
	  {IntMemory, size: 4}
	  |<
	    0 -> 0
	    1 -> 1
	    2 -> 2
	    3 -> 3
	  >|
